articles.title: Why your new Apple iPhone 15 is overheating - BBC
articles.description: The firm says a bug in its operating system and updates to apps like Instagram are behind the issue.
articles.content:
Apple has blamed a bug in its operating system and updates to apps such as Instagram for its new iPhone 15 overheating.
